column1: #Text=Katara says : " We have to get out of here !
#Text=I 'm not losing anyone else out here .
#Text=" Katara says : " Come on , we 're going down .
#Text=" Katara says : " Toph , shoot a rock right there .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Everything is taken care of .
#Text=Why would we go to the Earth Kingdom capital ?
#Text=" Fung says : " The city is filled with refugees .
#Text=" Iroh says : " We can hide in plain sight there .
#Text=And it 's the safest place in the world from the Fire Nation .
#Text=Even I could n't break through to the city .
#Text=" White Lotus member says : " I have the passports for our guests , but there are two men out on the street looking for them .
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " You seen these guys ?
#Text=" Sha - Mo says : " What are you doing in our land with a sandbender sailer ?
#Text=From the looks of it , you stole it from the Hami tribe .
#Text=" Katara says : " We found the sailer abandoned in the desert .
#Text=Our bison was stolen and we have to get to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Ghashiun says : " You dare accuse our people of theft while you ride in on a stolen sand sailer ?!
#Text=No one accused our people of anything .
#Text=If what they say is true , we must give them hospitality .
#Text=" Toph says : " I recognize the son 's voice .
#Text=" Toph says : " I never forget a voice .
#Text=" Aang says : " Where is my bison ?
